20110107091837.000|20110107091838.000|CC1|WAS ALL ABOUT NOT HAVING ENOUGH 
20110107091838.000|20110107091838.000|CC1|FOOD.                           
20110107091838.000|20110107091840.000|CC1|TODAY IS TO MAKE A DEADLINE, IS 
20110107091840.000|20110107091840.000|CC1|THE JOKE FUNNY, WHATEVER IT     
20110107091840.000|20110107091842.000|CC1|MIGHT BE.

20110107092212.000|20110107092214.000|CC1|   IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS   
20110107092214.000|20110107092214.000|CC1|   OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES
